content: * to last 2 sts p1 k1 using the long tail method co 54 sts row 2 ws p1 *k1 p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 p1 work 6 row in garter stitch knit every row row 3 repeat row 1 place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and row 4 knit last 3 sts in garter stitch as established begin bunting repeat row 1-4 thirteen more times work row 1 and 2 stitch as follows once row 1 rs *k4 p4 repeat from * to end of row work moss stitch border row 2 ws *p1 k3 p4 repeat from * to end of row bobble knitwise end off row 3 *k4 p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row row 4 *p3 k1 p4 repeat from * to end of row row 5 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of row row 6 *p5 k3 repeat from * to end of row row 7 *p2 k6 repeat from * to end of row row 8 *p7 k1 repeat from * to end of row repeat row 1-8 seven more times work 6 row in garter stitch #1 thermal bobble knitwise end off shown in aqua using the long tail method co 53 sts finishing work moss stitch border as follows weave in ends wet block to dimensions row 1 rs *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 row 2 ws *k1 p1 repeat from * to last st k1 repeat row 1 and 2 one more time place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and last 3 sts in moss stitch as established begin thermal stitch as follows row 1 rs knit #3 basketweave row 2 ws purl shown in green row 3 *p2 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 using the long tail method co 54 sts row 4 *k2 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 work 6 row in garter stitch knit every row repeat row 1-4 fifteen more times work row 1 and 2 once place marker 3 sts in from each end keeping the first and work moss stitch border last 3 sts in garter stitch as established begin harper point photography bobble knitwise end basketweave stitch as follows 2 c littlechurchknits com & cheryl toy 2022 | all rights reserved
